paragraphs.content: In the celestial glory there are three heavens or degrees;
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the celestial glory there are three heavens or degrees;

paragraphs.content: And in order to obtain the highest, a man must enter into this order of the priesthood [meaning the new and everlasting covenant of marriage];
paragraphs.contentHtml: And in order to obtain the highest, a man must enter into this order of the priesthood [meaning the new and everlasting covenant of marriage];

paragraphs.content: And if he does not, he cannot obtain it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And if he does not, he cannot obtain it.

paragraphs.content: He may enter into the other, but that is the end of his kingdom; he cannot have an increase.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He may enter into the other, but that is the end of his kingdom; he cannot have an increase.

paragraphs.content: (May 17th, 1843.) The more sure word of prophecy means a man’s knowing that he is sealed up unto eternal life, by revelation and the spirit of prophecy, through the power of the Holy Priesthood.
paragraphs.contentHtml: (May 17th, 1843.) The more sure word of prophecy means a man’s knowing that he is sealed up unto eternal life, by revelation and the spirit of prophecy, through the power of the Holy Priesthood.

paragraphs.content: It is impossible for a man to be saved in ignorance.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It is impossible for a man to be saved in ignorance.

paragraphs.content: There is no such thing as immaterial matter. All spirit is matter, but it is more fine or pure, and can only be discerned by purer eyes;
paragraphs.contentHtml: There is no such thing as immaterial matter. All spirit is matter, but it is more fine or pure, and can only be discerned by purer eyes;

paragraphs.content: We cannot see it; but when our bodies are purified we shall see that it is all matter.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We cannot see it; but when our bodies are purified we shall see that it is all matter.
